arousal.description: Arousal/activation: 0.0 (calm/low energy) to 1.0 (excited/high energy) Maps to Y-axis in VAE space

epistemic.description: Epistemic certainty: 0.0 (uncertain) to 1.0 (certain) Maps to Z-axis in VAE space

significance.description: Significance/mass: 0.0 (trivial) to 1.0 (very important) Affects physics simulation weight

valence.description: Emotional valence: -1.0 (very negative) to 1.0 (very positive) Maps to X-axis in VAE space
